DOC.brief_summary: Serious adverse events in patients treated with new oral anticoagulants are underreported.
DOC.brief_title: Reporting of Adverse Events in Patients Treated With New Oral Anticoagulants
DOC.detailed_description: The study investigates if serious adverse events in patients treated with NOAC are reported to the Health and Medicines Authority.
DOC.criteria: patients admitted for GI bleeding while in treatment with NOAC
